mapper.select: select * from member where userid = #{userid} and userpwd = #{userpwd}
mapper.insert: insert into member values (#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{hobby}, #{etc}, default, sysdate)
mapper.update: update member set userpwd = #{userpwd}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, etc = #{etc}, hobby = #{hobby}, lastmodified = sysdate where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select count(userid) from member where userid = #{value}
